Choose<T, U>(IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, Option<U>>)

Applies function chooser to each element of the sequence and returns a sequence containing results where this function returns Some<T>(T)

public static IEnumerable<U> Choose<T, U>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, Option<U>> chooser) where U : notnull

Parameters

source IEnumerable<T>

Source sequence with elements of type T

chooser Func<T, Option<U>>

Function to transform elements of type T into type Option<T>

Returns

IEnumerable<U>

Sequence of type U

TryFind<T>(IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, bool>)

Returns the first element of the sequence where the predicate function returns true. If no element is found, returns None
